author: hwright
msg: Check serf library version at runtime.
Avoid calling into a library incompatible with the one compiled against.

author: hwright
msg: Remove the 1.7.x-issue3888 branch, reintegrated in r1149167.

author: hwright
msg: For very large checkouts/updates/switches, ra_serf may consume
unbounded memory. That is not good.

author: markt
msg: Promote the Set Character Encoding filter to the filters package so it is more widely available.
